name: Horse of the Floral Knights
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 LIGHT "Noble Knight" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Horse of the Floral Knights" once per turn. Once per turn: You can Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using this card you control and other monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Materials.
